relation: Esmil Rogers starts the inning for the Indians.
Howie Kendrick grounded out short to first. None on with one out and Erick Aybar due up.
NOTE: Tonight's game is currently in a rain delay.
Maicer Izturis is pinch-hitting for John Hester.
Pinch-Hitter Maicer Izturis grounded out first to pitcher. On the play, Erick Aybar advances to third. Runner on third with two outs and Mike Trout due up.
Mike Trout struck out swinging to end the game.
